items.sentence: If you aren\'t there, we\'ll have our picture taken without you.
Tom wasn\'t a bit surprised by how well Mary could speak French.
I never thought that it\'d be this hard to build a picnic table.
Tom said he won\'t buy that jacket, because it\'s too expensive.
Tom said that he thought Mary was still living with her parents.
Tom was a very good friend of mine until he stole my girlfirend.
Tom assured me that this kind of problem wouldn\'t happen again.
I\'ve been studying French for a long time, but I\'m not fluent.
One potential problem is that Tom can\'t speak French very well.
I might be willing to help, depending on what you want me to do.
Tom gambled away all of the money that his grandfather gave him.
Tom tried to convince himself that he was doing the right thing.
Tom hasn\'t yet returned the book to me that Mary wants to read.
How did you know that Tom was the one who made these sandwiches?
We came up with a lot of ideas, but none of them were very good.
Tom is in the living room, telling a story to his grandchildren.
Tom plays soccer with his friends after school almost every day.
I wonder whether or not this is worth the price they\'re asking.
I thought Tom would need help getting in and out of the bathtub.
Do you realize what would\'ve happened if you hadn\'t helped us?
